EmailTemplate.description: Ask tour attendees to complete survey of the KOM
EmailTemplate.name: KOM Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Kindergarten Open Morning: Tell us what you think
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName}
Tell us what you think!
We would love your feedback on our recent Senior College Tour - please complete this quick survey - https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/SeniorCollegeTour.
Regards
Bruce Perry Registrar/Mathematics Teacher
phone 02 92869507 email BPerry@sacs.nsw.edu.au
